EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
This notification is to communicate that invoice {!Case.Receivable_Document__c} for your MSP Avionics/Mechanical Components contract {!Case.Contract_Number__c} for the subject line referred aircraft became past due on {!Case.Contract_End_Date__c}. Please remit payment immediately to avoid contract termination.
If you already sent your payment, please provide us with details to ensure that it is applied accordingly.
If you would like to pay your invoice through our portal using a credit card, please go to www.aerospace.honeywell.com and log in with your account credentials. Let us know if you elect to do this to ensure no further notifications are sent.
Thank you,
Regards,
MSP Avionics & Mechanical Contract Administration Q https://aerospace.honeywell.com
